scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: python -m venv backend/.venv || true && backend/.venv/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade pip && backend/.venv/bin/pip install -r backend/requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c auto "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
